job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtWho We Are ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFounded in 2020 by former members of the Essential Products team in Silicon Valley OSOM is a hardwaresoftware technology startup that prioritizes privacy OSOM pronounced awesome stands for Out of Sight Out of Mind As our mission states we are creating products that give people access to the world without giving the world access to them We are in stealth mode now but excited to introduce a future where our users decide how and when to share their personal informationltbrgtltbrgtAt OSOM we believe privacy is a right not a luxury or a privilege We want to enable every individual to own their privacy We are looking for passionate people to help us build this futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt Read More About OSOM Here  are looking for a Junior Software Engineer to design develop and test OSOM softwareltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt What Youll Do ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtImplement nicetohave P1P2 featuresltligtltligtImplement new userfacing and custom features with support from Senior and Lead EngineersltligtltligtResearch leading and future technologies to integrate into OSOMs product roadmapltligtltulgtWhat Were Looking Forltbrgtltulgtltligt12 years of professional software development or relevant project or design experienceltligtltligtUS applicants must be authorized to work in the USltligtltulgtHow Youll Stand OutltbrgtltulgtltligtRequire little direction to complete tasksltligtltligtBe creative proactive informed datadriven and resourcefulltligtltligtProven track record of completing projects tasks with supporting metricsltligtltulgtPerks Youll ReceiveltbrgtltulgtltligtMedical Dental Vision and Life InsuranceltligtltligtMaternity Paternity ampamp Adoption LeaveltligtltligtFlexible Paid Time Off ampamp Holidays Including a Winter Shut DownltligtltligtWork from Home StipendltbrgtltligtltulgtAt OSOM we are committed to providing an environment fundamentally built on mutual respect where employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees without regard to race color religion sex pregnancy nationality age disability marital status sexual orientation gender identity gender expression genetic information including characteristics and testing military service and veteran status and any other characteristic protected by applicable law OSOM believes that diversity and inclusion among our team is critical to our success as a companyltbrgtltbrgtOSOM is requiring all employees to be vaccinated against COVID19 unless the employee has a medical or religious reason not to be vaccinatedltbrgtltbrgtIf you need any accommodations or assistance with applying for a position please email us at recruitingosomprivacycom
